org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp

Class TaskGraphImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.ToolImp
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.TaskImp
        • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.TaskGraphImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TaskListener, ExecutionListener, Task, TaskGraph, Tool

    public class TaskGraphImp
extends TaskImp
implements TaskGraph, TaskListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    An TaskGraphImp containing a collection of Tasks linked by Cables
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Create a taskgraph that takes its details from a specified tool and uses a specific factory.

      Create a taskgraph that uses the default task factory.

      • groupTasks

        public TaskGraph groupTasks(java.lang.String[] tasknames,
                   java.lang.String groupname)
                     throws TaskException
        Groups the specified tasks, returning the taskgraph created. A default mapping between group nodes and task nodes is created. This can be changed later through setDataInputNode etc. in TaskGraph.
        Specified by:
        groupTasks in interface TaskGraph
        Throws:
        TaskException
